items.titolo: Il calcio entra nell’era dell’AI: al Mondiale 2026 allenatori, arbitri e tifosi guidati dai dati
items.descrizione: Lenovo e FIFA annunciano soluzioni tecnologiche basate sull’AI per operazioni intelligenti, supporto a giocatori e allenatori e fan experience più immersive alla FIFA World Cup 2026

items.titolo: Lenovo al CES 2026: il PC diventa una macchina intelligente, nasce Qira
items.descrizione: Al Tech World quest’anno al Ces di Las Vegas, Lenovo presenta Qira, l’AI personale che vive tra dispositivi, l’obiettivo è uno solo: portare l’intelligenza artificiale integrata nella macchina

items.titolo: Lenovo brings handheld-favorite SteamOS to the flagship Legion Go 2 — the AMD Z2 Extreme gets official SteamOS support for the first time
items.descrizione: Lenovo is bringing official SteamOS support to AMD’s Ryzen Z2 Extreme processor for the first time with an updated Legion Go 2.

items.titolo: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang says "the future is neural rendering" at CES 2026, teasing DLSS advancements — RTX 5090 could represent the pinnacle of traditional raster
items.descrizione: During a Q&A at CES 2025, Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang says that the future of graphics is neural rendering, and that the company is "working on things in the lab that are just utterly shocking and incredible."

items.titolo: AMD hints at officially open-sourcing FSR 4 upscaling and frame generation technology in the wake of accidental release — accidental release may have forced the company's hand
items.descrizione: AMD hints at officially open-sourcing FSR 4

items.titolo: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang says robots could be 'AI immigrants' that can address labor shortages — can 'do the type of work that maybe we decided not to do anymore'
items.descrizione: Jensen Huang, CEO of Nvidia, said that a wave of robots will serve as "AI immigrants" to drive the economy and do the jobs others don't want to do.

items.titolo: Nvidia says H200 demand in China is 'very high' as export licenses near completion — a month after the green light, Huang has high hopes for China buy-in despite political sensitivity
items.descrizione: Nvidia says demand in China for its H200 data center GPU is “very high,” as it works through the final stages of U.S. export licensing, according to comments from Jensen Huang at CES 2026.

items.titolo: CEO Jensen Huang says Nvidia could potentially resurrect old GPUs to address shortages and high pricing — adding performance-boosting advanced AI features to older architectures is also on the table
items.descrizione: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang says there are options on the table for easing GPU pricing pressures, including bringing newer AI features to older hardware.

items.titolo: Apple TV inizia il 2026 alla grande: 4 attesi ritorni a gennaio
items.descrizione: Per il servizio streaming Apple TV il 2026 inizierà nel migliore dei modi. Durante il mese di gennaio, infatti, sono attesi quattro ritorni in grande stile: su tutti Hijack, la serie tv con protagonista Idris Elba, pront

items.titolo: The 57 Best Shows on Disney+, WIRED’s Picks (January 2026)
items.descrizione: The End of an Era, Percy Jackson and the Olympians, and The Beatles Anthology are just a few of the shows you should be watching on Disney+ this month.

items.titolo: These Luxurious Headphones Are Almost Half Off
items.descrizione: The Bowers & Wilkins Px8 feature premium materials and luxurious sound.

items.titolo: Community tests confirm DLSS 4.5 yields 20%+ performance loss on older RTX 30 and 20 series GPUs compared to DLSS 4.0 — Nvidia warnings ring true following rollout
items.descrizione: DLSS 4.5 testing by enthusiasts has revealed a 20% or greater performance reduction compared to DLSS 4.0 on RTX 20- and 30-series GPUs.

items.titolo: Corsair's Galleon 100 SD is an LED-lit keyboard with a built-in Stream Deck — $349 offering includes 720 x 180 screen, dials, and more
items.descrizione: Describing the Galleon in one sentence is simple: it's a near-full-sized keyboard, except the usual numeric pad is instead an Elgato Stream Deck.

items.titolo: Meta frena i Ray-Ban Display in Europa: domanda troppo alta
items.descrizione: Meta rinvia l’arrivo dei Ray-Ban Display in Europa per domanda elevata e poche scorte

items.descrizione: Ancora una volta dalla beta di One UI 8.5 arrivano anticipazioni.

items.titolo: This portable power station kept my essentials running during a snowstorm outage
items.descrizione: I tested the EcoFlow Delta 3 Max Plus during a recent power outage, and it didn't flinch, even in cold weather.

items.titolo: Asus unveils the ROG Cronox, its first panoramic PC case with a 9.2" screen and rotating fan bracket — chassis supports up to 14x 120mm fans & dual 360mm radiators

items.descrizione: Un robot solare che ti segue e fornisce energia, presentato da Jackery al CES 2026.

items.titolo: Nvidia's focus on rack-scale AI systems is a portent for the year to come — Rubin points the way forward for company, as data center business booms
items.descrizione: Nvidia's CES keynote was notably not consumer-focused. Instead, the company detailed its booming data center business, with a deeper look at its NVL72 Rubin platform.

items.titolo: XREAL scommette su Android XR e stringe alleanza con Google
